jchess.gamelogic

Class PositionAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.PositionAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPosition, IPositionAgent

    public final class PositionAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPositionAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Position" (only) related data. It keeps the state of the Position and facilitates game-logic with numerous operations E.g. It lets game-logic about its neighbouring Positions and it also maintains the current state of the Position (Selected or Marked-for-Candidate-Move).
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim

      • tryGetOppositePath

        public java.util.List<IPositionAgent> tryGetOppositePath(IPositionAgent oPosition)
        This method returns the opposite Position against the provided one. NW N NE W * E SW S WE Consider * is the current Position. The Position provided in the argument is the one linked to SW. This method would return the Position that is linked to NE location (if any).
        Specified by:
        tryGetOppositePath in interface IPositionAgent
